0xDCFB5D4DB8BF367E.name: SHOW_CREW_INDICATOR_ON_BLIP
0xDCFB5D4DB8BF367E.comment: Enables or disables the blue half circle https://i.imgur.com/iZes9Ec.png around the specified blip on the left side of the blip. This is used to indicate that the player is in your crew in GTA:O. Color is changeable by using `SET_BLIP_SECONDARY_COLOUR`.
